question: How does JOBJACK work?
answer:
JOBJACK is an online platform where job seekers can register, create a profile and apply for entry-level jobs posted across South Africa by different employers like PEP, KFC, Food Lover’s Market and many more! 

Registering and using JOBJACK is FREE - everything happens online, from building your CV, applying for jobs and getting your interview details. 

If you would like to register and start applying for jobs on JOBJACK, please follow these steps: 

1️⃣ Go to app.jobjack.co.za/auth and click on “Sign Up” 
2️⃣ Fill in all of your details and click on “Register”
3️⃣ Go to your “Profile” section to complete your Basic Information, Experience and Skills sections

When you have filled in the information on your profile, we will create a JOBJACK CV for you and you can start applying for jobs from your “All Jobs” page. 

You can also visit our Resources on JOBJACK for tips and help: https://app.jobjack.co.za/resources 

If you have any specific questions about JOBJACK, please let us know.

question: Is JOBJACK a scam?
answer:
JOBJACK is a secure jobs platform. 

All jobs that are posted by employers are verified by JOBJACK first, so that as a job seeker, you know you are applying to a real company. 

If there is something specific you are worried about or that you need more info on, please let us know so that we can help!

question: Call me?
answer:
Thank you so much for reaching out to us. 

Unfortunately, we do not offer support via phone calls at the moment but we are more than happy to help you over email! 

If you need help with something specific, please send us the following information:

1️⃣ Your full name 
2️⃣ Your ID number 
3️⃣ Your phone number 
4️⃣ Your email address 
5️⃣ A screenshot of the issue  

Once we receive this information, we’ll look into the issue and get back to you as soon as possible.

answer:
New jobs are posted to JOBJACK regularly, but only some send out direct notifications. 

Please sign in regularly on JOBJACK to check for notifications about jobs you’ve applied to, and to see the latest posted jobs in your surrounding areas.

JOBJACK is also experimenting with a WhatsApp channel where jobs are shared every day.

question: Looking for a job - Already registered?
answer:
We are happy to hear that you are already registered on JOBJACK! 

When you have registered, remember to complete your profile and to apply to the specific jobs you are interested in!

Here are some general tips for your JOBJACK profile and applying for jobs:

️ Add a professional-looking profile picture
️ Give yourself the best chance by applying to jobs in your surrounding area that are most relevant to you

For more tips on what to add to your profile, have a look at our Resource section: https://app.jobjack.co.za/resources 

JOBJACK is also experimenting with a WhatsApp channel where jobs are shared every day.

question: Forgot password – send password link?
answer:
We can send you the password reset link: Please click on the link to create a new password. 

When your password has been reset, please log in to your existing account at app.jobjack.co.za/auth with your email address ( ) and your new password.  

ℹ️ Please use the reset link as soon as you receive it; the link expires after an hour and you will need to request a new link.

question: Verification info?
answer:
We can help update your existing JOBJACK account with your new phone number - then you can reset your password and log in to your account. 

To change your account details, we need to verify that the account belongs to you first. 

To verify that it is your account, please send us the details you used to create your existing JOBJACK profile: 
️ ID number 
️ Email address linked to your account
️ Old and new phone number 

Once we receive the above information, we can take the next steps.

question: Information verified?
answer:
Thank you for your information!

We have verified the account information you have sent us. Your JOBJACK profile has been updated with your new phone number: [number]

 If you have forgotten your password, please reset your password by following these steps:
1️⃣ Go to app.jobjack.co.za/auth
2️⃣ Click on “Forgot password”
3️⃣ Add your account email address [email] and select the “SMS” option

You will receive a reset link over SMS to your new number. Please click on this link to reset your password. 

When your password has been reset, please log in to your existing account at app.jobjack.co.za/auth with your email address and your new password. 

We suggest using only one JOBJACK account to keep all of your information together. 

You can change information and update your profile at any time from the “My Profile” section.

question: Can’t remember information?
answer:
Unfortunately, we cannot change any account details if you cannot provide us with the correct ID, phone number and email you used to register on JOBJACK.

For security, we can only make changes to accounts that are verified with the correct information.

If you are struggling to remember the phone number and email address that you previously used for your account, we suggest you try: 
️ Ask a friend or family member if they still have your old phone number saved 
️ Check on your phone if your old email address is still signed in 
️ Check in any of your old documents or files if they have your details on them

️ Check on your phone if your old email address is still signed in 
️ Check in any of your old documents or files if they have your details on them

question: I want to start fresh / create a new account?
answer: If you already have a profile on JOBJACK, please continue using your existing account. Here’s why it is better to use the same account: ️ All of your details and job applications are connected to one profile. If you create a new account, you will lose all of your job applications ️ You can easily update any information by going to your “My Profile” section! No need to redo everything ️ If you want help with improving your profile and applications, you can have a look at our free resources on JOBJACK here: https://app.jobjack.co.za/resources

question: Data?
answer:
JOBJACK is a web based app, so you will need a working data or wifi connection to connect to the site. 

JOBJACK has been built to be light on data so that you can browse more jobs for less data.

question: Login with email?
answer:
If you are struggling to log in with your ID number, please use the email address that is connected to your JOBJACK account. 

1️⃣ Go to JOBJACK’s login page here: app.jobjack.co.za/auth 
2️⃣ Add your email address in the ID/Passport field 
3️⃣ Add your password and login 

If you have forgotten your password, please reset it by clicking on the forgot password option.

question: ID linked?
answer:
If you are receiving an “ID already in use” error, it means that there is already an account registered on JOBJACK with this ID number. 

You only need one account registered on JOBJACK to apply for jobs. 

Please log in to your existing JOBJACK account at app.jobjack.co.za/auth - if you are struggling to sign in with your ID number, you can also use your email address to log in to your account. 

If you have forgotten your password, please reset your password by following these steps:
1️⃣ Go to app.jobjack.co.za/auth
2️⃣ Click on “Forgot Password”
3️⃣ Add your account email address and select the “SMS” or “Email” option

You will receive a reset link either via SMS or to the email address currently connected with your JOBJACK account. Please click on the link to reset your password. 

When your password has been reset, please log in to your existing account at app.jobjack.co.za/auth with your email address and your new password.  

When you have logged in to your account, you can update your information at any time from the “My Profile” section. 

If you believe that this is a mistake and you have not registered a JOBJACK account with your ID before, please inform us immediately

question: Already deleted account?
answer:
If your JOBJACK account was deleted, it can no longer be accessed or recovered. 

If you would like to use the JOBJACK platform, you’ll need to create a new account. 

Please go to  https://app.jobjack.co.za to reregister and create a new profile.

question: Error when saving profile?
answer:
Please try these steps to solve the issue: 

1️⃣ Make sure you have a stable internet connection
2️⃣ Hit refresh 
3️⃣ Try a different browser on your device

question: JOBJACK App?
answer:
Remember: JOBJACK is a web-based app. 

This means that you can access JOBJACK directly from the browser on your device by clicking on this link: app.jobjack.co.za/auth 

You have the option of downloading a shortcut to JOBJACK on your phone to help you access the browser link quicker, but you don’t need to download it. 

You can also bookmark the JOBJACK platform in your browser for quick access.

question: Apply by location?
answer:
JOBJACK will automatically show you the jobs posted closest to the location you added on your profile. 

If you want to search for a specific location you can 

1️⃣ Log in to your JOBJACK profile at app.jobjack.co.za/auth 
2️⃣ Click on the “All Jobs” section in the menu 
3️⃣ Use the search bar to type in your location or suburb and select it when it appears on the list

You will now see all of the jobs posted in the location you have searched for! 

If you get a “Sorry - no jobs available in this section” message, it means that there are unfortunately no jobs posted in that area at the moment. You can click on the “x” next to the location to clear your search.

question: Flagged Profile?
answer:
Flagged Profile

Your account will only be flagged if you accepted an interview on JOBJACK, and did not attend without withdrawing on the platform to let the employer know you will no longer be attending.

This flag does not block any of your applications; it is only added as extra information when an employer is reviewing your application. 

You can still apply to any job that you are interested in.

question: 100% Profile?
answer:
If you want to get your profile to 100%, you need to add information to all of these sections: 

️ Basic Information
️ Experience 
️ Skills 
️ Additional information

When you have added information to all of these sections, all the blocks will turn green and your profile will show 100% complete.

question: Tax number needed?
answer:
You do not need your Tax number to apply for jobs on JOBJACK, but some employers may request your Tax details as a supporting document in the later stages of the interview process. 

Having your Tax details ready can make your interview and onboarding easier for an employer to process. 

If you have not registered for your Tax number, or if you are unsure what your Tax number is, you can reach out to SARS directly or visit your nearest SARS branch.

question: Bad credit score/debt?
answer:
Some jobs posted on JOBJACK require a credit check as part of the application process. 

You will be notified on the application if a credit check is required, and you will always be asked for your consent to run the credit check.

question: Experience needed?
answer:
Every employer and job has different requirements when it comes to experience. 

Some jobs don’t ask for experience, but some jobs may require specific experience for a role. 

You are always welcome to apply to any job that you are interested in; however, it is good to check what a job’s requirements are before applying, to see if your experiences matches what they are asking for.

You can go through all of the job details and requirements by clicking “Job Details”.

question: Age restriction?
answer:
Any job seeker over the legal working age (15 years old) can register and create a profile on JOBJACK. 

As a job seeker, you can apply to any job that is posted on JOBJACK that you are interested in. 

As with any recruitment process, some employers may have a preference in what they are looking for in a candidate but you are always welcome to apply.

question: Withdrew by mistake?
answer:
If you withdrew your application by mistake, you will need to reapply for the job. 

This means you will have to look for the specific job in the All Jobs section and complete the application process again.

question: Additional Information?
answer:
Your JOBJACK profile has different sections, each with a specific function: 

Basic Information, Skills and Experience sections
️ These sections need to be filled in for us to create your JOBJACK CV for you, so that you can apply for jobs. 

Additional Information
️ This section includes your Bank details and Tax number, which will be used by an employer later in the hiring process. This information is only needed after you have been hired.

question: Change employment status?
answer:
If you have been appointed for a job on JOBJACK, it will not automatically update your employment status on your profile or block you from applying to other opportunities. 

If you would like to change your employment status on your profile, follow these steps: 
1️⃣ Log in to your JOBJACK profile at app.jobjack.co.za/auth 
2️⃣ Open your Profile and go to your “Experience” section
3️⃣ Make sure that your last work experience timeframe is updated: If you are currently still employed, please select the “I still work here” box. If you are no longer working at the company, please add the end date of your employment.

question: Change phone number?
answer:
Here’s how to update your phone number:

1️⃣ Log in to your JOBJACK profile at app.jobjack.co.za/auth 
2️⃣ Open your Profile 
3️⃣ Go to “Basic Information” and update your phone number. Remember to click Save!

Remember: Add your phone number and WhatsApp number to your profile (if you are using two numbers) so that employers know which number to call when they are trying to reach you.

question: Change nationality?
answer:
Unfortunately, your nationality cannot be changed on your profile once you have registered. 

We suggest deleting your profile and re-registering your JOBJACK account. 

If you would like to delete your profile, please follow these steps: 
1️⃣ Log in to your JOBJACK profile at app.jobjack.co.za/auth 
2️⃣ Open your Profile 
3️⃣ Scroll to the bottom of your profile and click on “Delete Account” 

Once your account has been deleted, please register with your correct details.

question: Change ID?
answer:
For security, ID numbers cannot be changed on JOBJACK. If the ID number on your account is incorrect, you will need to do the following: 
1️⃣ Delete the existing profile 
2️⃣ Reregister with your correct details
 

If you would like to delete your profile, please follow these steps: 
1️⃣ Log in to your JOBJACK profile at app.jobjack.co.za/auth 
2️⃣ Open your Profile 
3️⃣ Scroll to the bottom of your profile and click on “Delete Account” 

Once your account has been deleted, please register with your correct ID details.

question: Change Location?
answer:
Here’s how to update your location:

1️⃣ Log in to your JOBJACK profile at app.jobjack.co.za/auth 
2️⃣ Open your Profile 
3️⃣ Go to “Basic Information” and update your location by typing and selecting it from the drop-down list

Remember: Please use the current location you are staying in to the closest suburb.

question: Change experience?
answer:
Here’s how to update your work experience:

1️⃣ Log in to your JOBJACK profile at app.jobjack.co.za/auth 
2️⃣ Open your Profile 
3️⃣ Go to your Experience section and click on “Add Experience” 

For each experience entry please add: 
️ Your role and the company you worked for 
️ A reliable work reference
️ The training you received on the job
️ The dates you worked at the company

question: Change profile picture?
answer:
Here’s how to update your profile picture:

1️⃣ Log in to your JOBJACK profile at app.jobjack.co.za/auth 
2️⃣ Open your Profile 
3️⃣ Click on “Change Profile Picture” and upload your picture

We also have a Resource available on JOBJACK with tips on how to take a professional looking profile picture: https://app.jobjack.co.za/resources/portal/13

question: Delete Profile?
answer:
If you no longer want to use JOBJACK, you can delete your account by following these steps: 

1️⃣ Log in to your JOBJACK profile at app.jobjack.co.za/auth 
2️⃣ Open your Profile 
3️⃣ Scroll to the bottom of your profile and click on “Delete Account” 

 Remember: If you want to change any information, you can always edit it from your Profile. 

️ Deleting your account will remove all your applications and profile information. You will not be able to retake the assessments if you decide to create a new profile. After a profile has been deleted, it cannot be recovered.

question: CV Download?
answer:
You can download your JOBJACK CV directly to your phone or computer!

1️⃣ Log in to your JOBJACK profile at app.jobjack.co.za/auth 
2️⃣ Open your Profile 
3️⃣ At the top of your page, click on “My CV” 

You can choose to view or download your CV from here. If you download your CV it will automatically save as a PDF file on your device.

question: Why does it not save when I am done?
answer:
Canned response 1: Request more information

If you are having trouble saving information on your Assessment, please try these steps: 

️ Make sure you have a stable data or wifi connection
️ Refresh the page and try to save

If the information is still not saving, please send us the following details: 

1️⃣ Your full name 
2️⃣ Your ID number 
3️⃣ Your phone number 
4️⃣ Your email address 
5️⃣ A screenshot of the page that is not saving  

When we have all of the information, we will look into the issue for you.

question: How to download a certificate?
answer:
When you have completed a course on JOBJACK, you can download your certificate by following these steps: 

1️⃣ Go to your Training section on JOBJACK
2️⃣ Find the course that you have completed 
3️⃣ Click on ‘Download Certificate’ 

Your certificate will be downloaded to your device!

question: Tips improve profile?
answer:
These are the most important things to keep in mind when you are creating and updating your JOBJACK profile: 

️ Add information to each section of your profile 
️ Make sure all of your latest and updated information is on your profile (remember, we create your JOBJACK CV with it!)
️ Add a professional-looking profile picture

Remember: It’s also important to apply for jobs most relevant to you in your surrounding areas. 

Don’t give up, your job opportunity could be an application away!

For more tips on what to add to your profile, have a look at our Resource section: https://app.jobjack.co.za/resources

question: Unsuccessful?
answer:
If you are currently employed at the company you attended your interview for, but your status shows “Unsuccessful”, please send us the following information: 

1️⃣ Name, ID, phone number 
2️⃣ The name of the job and company you are working at  
3️⃣ A screenshot of interview that shows the ‘Unsuccessful’ status

When we have all of the information, we will follow up with the store manager on the status.

question: Appointed, no feedback?
answer:
If you received an “Appointed” notification on JOBJACK and you have not received any starting details from the employer, please send us the following information: 

1️⃣ Name, ID, phone number 
2️⃣ When you received your Appointment message
3️⃣ A screenshot of the job you have been Appointed for (Under your ‘Appointed’ section) 
4️⃣ Any other communication you may have received from the store manager

When we have all of the information, we will follow up with the store manager on the status of your starting details.

question: How long till feedback?
answer:
Where you will receive feedback on your applications
️ If you are selected for an interview, you will receive an SMS and a notification on the platform 
️ Your “My Jobs” section on your JOBJACK profile will show you all of the latest available feedback on your applications

Remember: Each employer’s recruitment time is different depending on how many people they are hiring for and how many applications they receive. 

As soon as an employer adds feedback to JOBJACK, your status will automatically be updated

question: Nothing displaying?
answer:
If you have received an SMS notification for an interview and you log into your JOBJACK account and cannot see an interview request, it can be for two reasons:

️ It could be that the employer has decided to remove the interview
️ Or that your time to respond to the interview has expired and the interview has already passed. 

Please provide us with the following details: 
1️⃣ Name, ID, phone number 
2️⃣ The name of the job and company you received the interview for. 

When we have all of the information, we will follow up to see if the interview round was removed or if the response time expired.

question: No timeslot?
answer:
If you cannot select a time slot for your interview, please send us the following details: 

1️⃣ Name, ID, phone number 
2️⃣ The name of the job and company you received the interview request for

Please simplify to: As soon as we have the information, we will investigate and get back to you.

question: Rescheduling interviews?
answer:
We can contact the employer to find out if a reschedule would be possible. Please provide us with the following details: 

1️⃣ Name, ID, phone number 
2️⃣ The name of the job and company you received the interview request for

Please remember that a reschedule for your interview is dependent on the store manager and not JOBJACK.

question: Extending contracts?
answer:
Thank you for reaching out to us about your employment contract!

JOBJACK only manages the recruiting platform where job seekers apply for jobs and where employers post their jobs.

We are not involved in any internal processes after employment. 

We encourage you to reach out to your employer with any questions regarding your employment contract.

question: Referral reject or decline?
answer:
Thank you for making a referral on JOBJACK! 

This is how the Refer a Friend rewards works:

️  You share a Referral Job link from the “Refer a Friend” section on JOBJACK
️ Your friend uses the link you sent them to apply for the job (this is important! They need to use your link) 

If your friend is successfully hired and working at the Referral Job using your link, you get rewarded! 

If your friend received an offer for the job but they declined the Appointment, unfortunately, you will not get a reward.

question: Referral not yourself?
answer:
You cannot make a Referral to yourself. 

This means that you cannot use the Referral Link to apply for the job and get the reward. The Referral Link needs to go to someone else. 

This is how the Refer a Friend rewards work:

️  You share a Referral Job link from the “Refer a Friend” section on JOBJACK
️ Your friend uses the link you sent them to apply for the job (this is important! They need to use your link) 

If your friend is successfully hired and working at the Referral Job using your link, you get rewarded!

question: Referral 75% complete?
answer:
If you want to Refer a Friend for a job, your Basic Information, Experience and Skills sections need to be complete. 

You and your friend need to have a complete profile so that you can send the link and so that they can apply using your link. 

This is how the Refer a Friend rewards work:

️  You share a Referral Job link from the “Refer a Friend” section on JOBJACK
️ Your friend uses the link you sent them to apply for the job (this is important! They need to use your link) 

If your friend is successfully hired and working at the Referral Job using your link, you get rewarded!

question: Referral JJ reward?
answer:
Refer a Friend and rewards are run by JOBJACK and not the employer of the job. 

This means that the reward comes from JOBJACK for job seekers using Refer a Friend on the platform.

question: Referral job not available?
answer:
If you can no longer see a specific job under the Refer a Friend section, it means that the job has been closed. 

Remember: Only the jobs in the Refer a Friend section are part of the rewards programme.

question: Referral link sharing?
answer:
You can share a Referral Link as many times as you like! 

The jobs under the “Refer a Friend” section on JOBJACK are all part of the rewards programme. You can share a link with a friend by copying the link or sharing it directly over WhatsApp or Facebook. 

This is how the Refer a Friend rewards work:

️  You share a Referral Job link from the “Refer a Friend” section on JOBJACK
️ Your friend uses the link you sent them to apply for the job (this is important! They need to use your link) 

If your friend is successfully hired and working at the Referral Job using your link, you get rewarded!

question: Referral receive reward?
answer:
If a friend you referred applied using the link you shared with them, they have been successfully hired and they have started working, you will receive your reward!

This is how the Refer a Friend rewards work:

️  You share a Referral Job link from the “Refer a Friend” section on JOBJACK
️ Your friend uses the link you sent them to apply for the job (this is important! They need to use your link) 

If your friend is successfully hired and working at the Referral Job using your link, you get rewarded!
